channel.title: [317] 2 Questions
channel.description:
Alright I need to know 2 things. #1 Where would I go to edit how much xp a dragon bone gives on a altar?
#2 where would I go to edit a way a monster gives xp and what I mean by that is When somebody is using slash or strength at rock crabs in other words it trains all 3 stats.

item.title: [317] 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

It trains all 3 and I just want it to train each specific one Rock crabs are the only monster that does that.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

1.) Open Client.java and search
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);

2.) It currently trains all 3 combat stats, not just one? Or you want to know how to make it train all three?

Read full topic
